3. What will be returned by `ls .` after running the code below?

```{r, engine='bash', eval=FALSE}
mkdir newStuff
cd newStuff
cp ../../names.txt .
mv ../../addresses.txt ../
cd ..
cp newStuff/addresses.txt .
rm -r newStuff
```
